dialog: Frank always used to say, "Tell your story walkin', pal." He was more philosophical than your average gumshoe, but he liked to do his talkin' on the move, so here's how it all went down.
I got somethin' wrong with my head.
That's the first thing to know.
It's like having glass in the brain.
I can't stop pickin' things apart...
It's like an itch that has to be scratched.
Quit pullin' at it. You're gonna make a fuckin' mess out of things.
I got threads in my heads.
I got threads in my heads!
I got threads in my heads, man!
It makes me look like a goddamn spastic, but if I try to hold it back, it just makes it worse.
Shit, just help me out, will ya?
